location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to John Wedderburn, Civil Auditor, Bombay

mods.abstract: Stannus submits a list (transcribed within the letter) of items of expenditure, which had not been expressly authorised by Government, including costs of entertaining Kasim Khan and his suite, who had been proceeding on a mission to Bombay in September 1825, and costs of repairs to the Residency, December 1825 - March 1826.
